{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$34.1M in 2021-2022** on contracts with D H PARTNERSHIP.

Across 2 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (100%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 2303% and the average number of amendments was 4. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$681.4M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 6.15 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$619.1M. The longest contract was 10.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$897.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [D+H CORPORATION](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22D%2bH%20CORPORATION%22)
- [D & H PARTNERSHIP](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22D%20%26%20H%20PARTNERSHIP%22)
- [D&H Partnership](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22D%26H%20Partnership%22)
{{< /details >}}
